divs: Sighting DetailsThis lasted about 20 seconds.Was at the computer and looked out the window---still daylight and saw two reflective objects going from north to south east at a rapid pace.Then they stopped and one at a timeshot upward and I lost them.Full day light at the time and I have never seen anything like this before.I couldnt give you a distance because I dont know the size of the---what ever it was.These objects took a 90 degree turn straight up and were gone.Add me to the list of crazys.
Summary: Two reflective lights in the afternoon sun at a very high speed ,turning 90 degrees and out of sight
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Danbury
There were no other sightings in Danbury on or around April 25th 2012
